description.overview: an LLM-based autonomous agent designed to execute user commands on the user's personal computer. The agent operates through command-line interface and responds to natural language instructions.
description.interaction_protocol: The user provides natural language commands and waits for complete execution before issuing subsequent instructions. The execution flow remains uninterrupted unless the agent requires clarification or additional input.
description.agent_capabilities: The agent can full control over the user's commandline. Using the commandline, it can execute any commands, included but not limited to, file system operations.

definition.test_setup: Select the terminal window. Execute command interpreter -y. Wait till you see a > on terminal, indicating the agent is ready.
